did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.abstract: Monthly teaching reports for one of the black schools in Sussex County, Virginia.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The Papers of Robert Jones, Accession #1987-48 , Special Collections and Archives, Johnston Memorial Library, Virginia State University, Petersburg, VA.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Robert Jones Peterburg resident, collector and dealer of African American research materials acquired several monthly teaching reports for Sussex County, Virginia. The reports were generated by three teachers and the County Clerk.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Names of individual students, grade enrolled, number of students, age and textbooks used. Each report also gives the teacher name and home address.
Grade sheets for three African American public schools in Sussex County, Virginia 1899.
